OpenShift 3

The principal purpose of the OpenShift 3 Special Interest Group is to collaborate and discuss items for the upcoming OpenShift 3 platform.

Join the OpenShift V3
Special Interest Group

    OpenShift V3 Commons Brieffing
  1. By: Mike Barrett
  2. V3 Commons

    3. OpenShift Product Manager Mike Barrett goes over Commons and how you can get involved with OpenShift V3

    Topics Covered

    • Install
    • Deploy
    • Contribute
    • Microservices
    • Open Source

    About OpenShift v3

    OpenShift v3 is built around a core of application containers powered by Docker, with orchestration and management provided by Kubernetes, on a foundation of Atomic and Enterprise Linux.
